special_text:
[+1]: Look at the top two cards of your library. You may reveal a Kraken, Leviathan, Octopus, or Serpent card from among them and put both cards into your hand. Otherwise, put one of them into your hand.
[-4]: Create an 8/8 blue Octopus creature token.
[-7]: You get an emblem with “Whenever you cast a creature spell, search your library for a creature card with equal or lesser mana value and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle.”
